description:
He's back and he's ready to show you what you've been missing.

We're talking about that football playing, ex-military hunk Brodie.

It's been a while since Brodie showed his beautiful ass on NextDoorMale, but he's back and looking as good as ever.

Other than having a new girlfriend and a new home, Brodie's still the same, good natured hot young guy.So sit back and enjoy watching one of our most requested guys stroke himself on the sofa, in the bathroom and in the bed.
title: Brodie
